column4: hello there, can anybody show me any document showing how to export an encrypted directory? I encrypted my home dir. If I try exporting it, i get "exportfs: /home/usuer1/backup does not support NFS export"
are you trying to recover it?
no, it's not for data recovery. I just want to be able to export it over NFS
unless, you really can't export an encrypted dir at all.
